emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Software Lifecycle Automation
emerging_technologies.description: Advanced AI systems that manage the entire software development lifecycle from coding, testing, to deployment, significantly reducing human oversight.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces coding jobs but increases productivity, demands for new skills in AI management and oversight.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High initial investment, need for extensive training, regulatory compliance regarding AI decision-making.

emerging_technologies.name: Cognitive Enhancement via Neural Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Implantable devices that enhance cognitive functions like memory, focus, and learning speed.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for cognitive inequality, ethical concerns over privacy, enhancement versus therapy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High cost, ethical and regulatory hurdles, public acceptance of brain-computer interfaces.

emerging_technologies.name: Space Habitat Prototypes
emerging_technologies.description: Initial prototypes for self-sustaining habitats on Mars or the Moon using local materials.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: New frontiers for humanity, potential for space resource exploitation, changes in international law regarding space colonization.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, funding, international collaboration, and environmental concerns.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain-based Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: A decentralized identity system using blockchain for secure, private identity verification across multiple platforms.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances personal data control, reduces identity theft, but raises concerns over data sovereignty.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ease of integration into existing systems, regulatory acceptance, user trust in blockchain.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI tools that assist in coding by suggesting code, debugging, and optimizing development processes.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, becoming standard in software development education.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Vehicle Networks
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully integrated networks of autonomous vehicles for public and private transport.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Urban areas are leading in adoption, with regulatory frameworks being developed to manage safety and infrastructure.

epoch_themes.description: Deep integration of AI into all aspects of technology, enhancing efficiency and autonomy in systems.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shift in job markets, new forms of human-AI collaboration, ethical considerations around automation.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, AI-driven policy making, global AI standards.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on creating sustainable environments in space for long-term human habitation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Expansion of human presence beyond Earth, new resource management strategies.
epoch_themes.global_trends: International space collaborations, space law development, public-private space initiatives.
